title: Why execs must study AI, cybersecurity
description: BUSINESS executives may need to go back to school to adapt to the rapid changes affecting the operations and direction of their respective companies — specifically the use of artificial intelligence (AI) and cybersecurity.
content:

title: Meta Cutting Roughly 600 AI Jobs As Company Aims To Move Faster
description: Meta Platforms Inc. is cutting approximately 600 jobs from the company’s artificial intelligence unit, Meta Superintelligence Labs, as it aims to move more quickly in the competitive AI race. Employees impacted by the cuts were alerted on Wednesday, according to an internal memo reviewed by Bloomberg News, though the company’s newly formed TBD Lab group, which includes many of the highly-paid recent hires, was not affected.
content:
Meta Platforms Inc. is cutting approximately 600 jobs from the company’s artificial intelligence unit, Meta Superintelligence Labs, as it aims to move more quickly in the competitive AI race.

title: Country music star Martina McBride's deepfake scam warning
description: Artificial intelligence-generated deepfakes are threatening the livelihoods of musicians and creating scams that harm fans.
content: In May, country singer Martina McBride appeared before the Senate Judiciary Subcommittee on Privacy, Technology and the Law at a hearing to speak out against AI-generated deepfakes. Last week, she expanded on her testimony at the CNBC AI Summit in Na... [2911 chars]

title: Meta in $27 billion financing deal with Blue Owl Capital for Louisiana data center
description: META has struck a $27-billion financing deal with Blue Owl Capital to fund its biggest data center project globally, as large technology companies race to build out the infrastructure needed to power their artificial intelligence (AI) ambitions.

title: US bill could spell disaster for BPO sector
description: WITH concerns growing throughout the business processing outsourcing (BPO) sector about the potential negative effects of the growth of artificial intelligence (AI) on the Philippines’ $30-billion-a-year economic engine, another more immediate threat is looming in the form of a rare bipartisan bill in the United States Congress that would penalize US firms for using offshore BPO services. While the bill has not passed yet, and may not for some time, the implications of it are potentially disastrous.
content: WITH concerns growing throughout the business processing outsourcing (BPO) sector about the potential negative effects of the growth of artificial intelligence (AI) on the Philippines’ $30-billion-a-year economic engine, another more immediate threat... [3947 chars]

title: Meta cutting hundreds of roles in AI unit
description: Meta is cutting around 600 positions out of the several thousand roles in its Superintelligence Labs, the Facebook owner said today as it looks to make its artificial intelligence unit more flexible and responsive.

title: AI not a reliable source of news - EU study
description: PARIS — Artificial intelligence (AI) assistants such as ChatGPT made errors about half the time when asked about news events, according to a vast study by European public broadcasters released on Wednesday.
content:
PARIS — Artificial intelligence (AI) assistants such as ChatGPT made errors about half the time when asked about news events, according to a vast study by European public broadcasters released on Wednesday.

description: Advances in artificial intelligence help Trump in his efforts to manufacture reality.
